content.question: Both works do which of the following?

choices.label: Display a preference for elevated historical subjects
Combine emotional narrative and didactic content
Help to buttress the churchâ€™s position
Illustrate the eighteenth-century taste for the decorative

content.answer: Combine emotional narrative and didactic content

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain how two or more works of art are similar and/or different in how they convey meaning.
